synopsis.text: This romantic anime OVA flashes back 20 years to tell the story of how Yuuki's parents, Midori and Tamaki, first met and fell in love. As Yuuki visits his mother in the present day, she decides it's finally time to share details of her long-ago relationship with his father. Though Tamaki's identity as a vampire posed early challenges, we witness the couple navigate various obstacles side-by-side. Ultimately they triumph, not only finding acceptance from one another but building a lasting partnership. Their tale offers inspiration - proof that connections can grow despite divides. Watch the passions unfold in this prequel revealing the origins of an enduring, inter-species bond.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
